summary: This document is a chain of email correspondence between Sigrid McCawley, a partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP, and an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York. The emails discuss scheduling a trial date for the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, including the availability of a witness (likely a victim) who is expecting to adopt a baby in November 2021.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.role: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP
persons.context: Attorney corresponding with the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding trial scheduling and witness availability in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The accused in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).

connections.description: McCawley is a partner at the law firm representing Maxwell, as indicated by her involvement in scheduling the trial.

events.title: Proposed Trial Start Date
events.description: A witness is available to testify if the trial begins on November 29, 2021.

events.title: Witness Unavailability Period
events.description: A witness would likely be unavailable for trial between October 1, 2021 and Thanksgiving (approximately November 25, 2021).

events.title: Defense Requested Continuance Date
events.description: The defense had previously filed a letter requesting a continuance of the trial to November 8, 2021.

events.title: Witness's Adoption Timeline
events.description: A witness and her husband are trying to adopt a baby, with the birth mother due in early November 2021.

keyFacts: The emails discuss coordinating the trial schedule for United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, focusing on witness availability.
A key witness prefers an early September 2021 trial date due to an impending adoption, with a baby due in early November.
The defense had previously requested a continuance of the trial to November 8, 2021.
Sigrid McCawley of Boies Schiller Flexner LLP is actively involved in scheduling communications with the U.S. Attorney's Office.
